You may think you look pretty good batting in the nets for 10 minutes, but add some fitness pressure and your technique can come to pieces. PVBatex exists to address this problem.

Pin High is the fastest GPS rangefinder in golf. Designed to get you in and out of the app as fast as possible, Pin High keeps you focused on your round and not tinkering with your phone. 

To use Pin High simply press and hold on the map, the distance to that point is shown, drag your finger around to zero in on your target. You can get the distance to any point on the course.

- Press and hold or tap on the screen to get the distance to your target
- Use either Meters or Yards
- GPS accuracy is shown as a circle around the target point
- Location tracking turns off automatically when you leave the course
- No sign-up or login, just open the app and enjoy!

We hope you love Pin High and we are interested in hearing from you! Please send your feedback or feature requests to contact@pinhigh.app
